about_the_game:
EXIT M U S I C

Pack

Music are files available in high quality in mp3 format.

Tracks:
01 - EXIT1 main theme
02 - EXIT1 menu
03 - EXIT1 hurry
04 - EXIT2-3-4 hurry
05 - EXIT2 main theme
06 - EXIT2 menu
07 - EXIT3 main theme
08 - EXIT3 menu
09 - EXIT4 main theme
10 - EXIT4 menu

short_description: This DLC contains all musics ever released in EXIT games.
